summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 51st Avenue South, from Rainier Avenue to a point 200 feet south of Hazel Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8806 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
